external.description: Strudel is a music live coding environment for the browser, porting the TidalCycles pattern language to JavaScript.
external.title: Strudel REPL

record.text: Played around with a friend's Telepathic Instruments Orchid on Xmas Eve, and still thinking about it. The concept of a chord synth just clicks with me. I hope I can avoid costly purchases by diving deeper into live coding with strudel.cc
